name: HurdleBot
description:
You are practicing for the Tokyo Olympics. The Japanese team developed a robot that places hurdles randomly on the track so you can practice non-stop, but the robot is not safe yet...

Move between the lanes with arrow keys or WASD, don't get too close to the robot and try to get the highest score. You are not very good with hurdles, so they will slow you down.

Music and sfx by Socks

Code by Gustavo Rubo
